Microsoft Code.Fun.Do

November 21, 2016

This was Microsoftâ€™s Code.Fun.Do, a hackathon conducted annually by Microsoft in IIT Bombay itself. It is a 24 hours event, where students along with mentors, who were Microsoft employees hacked in the SL1 and SL2 labs of the Computer Science department.

Google I/O Extended 2017

May 18, 2017

Google I/O Extended -experience of the magic and innovation of Google I/O remotely. Part viewing experience and part community building, I/O Extended programme included everything from live streaming the Google I/O content to local developer demos and speaker sessions.

  • Learn More

Build a Career in Tech Without a CS Major

April 9, 2017

This talk was based on the blog post written by Aman Goel- https://medium.com/@amangoeliitb/build-a-solid-career-in-tech-without-a-cs-major-39cdef86013#.nmx11184b which was widely read. Sumith Kulal also accompanied him to pitch in a few facts about the Google Summer of Code program.
The overall agenda was to get a roadmap to prepare for tech internships and jobs.

  • Learn More

Yahoo! Hack U

March 25, 2017

Hack U is an event conducted by Yahoo! JAPAN exclusively for students from various universities all over the world. Students get a platform to develop their innovative ideas and showcase their talent.
You can check out the event page here

The Web and Coding Club

We are the coding community of IIT Bombay. WnCC is one of the biggest clubs of IIT Bombay. We believe that every individual should know how to code. Under the aegis of ITC (former STAB), we carry forward our vision of propagating the enthusiasm for coding in our institute.
